ygData.messageBody:
Exactly.  And ya know what...the game back then was FUN.  It was a challenge.  You felt a sense of accomplishment when you fought your way with 3 groups to the Efreeti room, or just made it safely to CT alone with your kos to everything in those zones character.
 
I'm not saying the game can't be fun now, or there's no accomplishment in whatever goals people set for themselves now days, the game certainly has changed.  But if anything the game doesn't need to be made even easier than it already is.
 
Telon Stormwarden
65 Ranger on E'ci
It's kinda silly reading this list of complaints for me.   Having started in Mar. '99, I've been able to see the perspective of how incredibly easy players have it today.    Take into account.. back then...
Deaths cost 2x the amount of exp.
There was only the old world to explore and level in, so you had the choice of like..  Spectres, or . .hmm, Spectres... to kill for exp at certain levels.
There were no high level Clerics etc...  so if you wanted a res, too bad.  Clarity?  Too bad.  Clarity 2?  Didnt exist..     PoT9?  Forget it.  A port?  Nope.. you're walking.
And equipment was like..  omg, Flowing Black Robes at level 50.
 
Nowadays, players have a seemingly endless supply of NPC's to kill, .. the exp penalty for dying has been halved...    Equipment is 15 times better or something ridiculous, and with the inception of the Bazaar, can be found and acquired in a matter of minutes for anyone who wants to walk 3 minutes tops to the PoKnowledge book in their local town and port there. ...    etc... etc.  
 
 if anything, make the game harder to advance instead of easier ;x
 
 
Cryonax Beltane
Arch Lich of The Mystical Order
